forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 62F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.
